title: Trolling in champion select
body:
So is there ever going to be something implimented to punish people trolling in champion select?
Because getting to the last pick and having someone say "feed" because they didn't get what they wanted, and choosing a stupid champion is kinda frustrating. Just strong arming someone into dodging because they're being childish.

replies.body:
>choosing a stupid champion

Even if we presume that playing unviable champs is a crime, that's still not an effective reason to report someone.

It's different from someone who's just trying to be toxic. You can feed with even the best champion.

The tribunal is currently in recess, but it'll eventually be back. For now, we can just use the in-client report system. If you really want to make the report effective, [submit a ticket](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/anonymous_requests/new) containing detailed information about the misbehaviour.

Yes, everyone is talking about this and Riot... How can I said this, may be something like what the f took u so long to do something Riot, you only care about master or challenger rank what about lower rank? What about trolling, no one want to spend 20 mins to do a report. So let wait and see how Riot respond this, they might ban me for tell the truth either :D
